title: [Gameplay] Bug tristana's animation
body: {{champion:18}} Tristana's animation of her dance, recall etc. are bug were she keeps holding the rocket when she is suppose to let go. example; she will float in mid hair when she taunt's or recall's. I have only experience this  with Riot girl tristana since I have not used another skin yet. doesn't affect anything else of her but is funny to watch.

replies.body:
Hey Axismundus,

Thanks for the bug report! You definitely did it right - giving examples and details like you've done helps us when it comes to figuring out how the bug is occurring. :] 

This is a known issue, and we're currently working to resolve it!
also this is the first time I leave a bug report so dunno if I did it right or wrong.
